What should I do if I have any questions about the information in the Verus Coin Wiki, need help, or have suggestions on the content?
If you have any questions about the information in the Verus Coin Wiki, need help, or have suggestions on the content, you can contact the Verus team through their Discord channel.

# ![Verus Coin](https://wiki.verus.io/img/favicon.png "Verus Coin Wiki") Verus Coin Wiki In this WIKI we collected the most frequently asked questions and useful guides that are related to Verus.On the bottom of each document, you may find a revision and/or creation date. If no date is mentioned the document originates from before february 12th, 2020 and may apply to older situations.If you have any questions about the information here, need help or have suggestions on
